summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，表示写入和读取用户批注的数据存储区。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.

summary.span: 将新 添加到存储区中。

span.span: Adds a new to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将新 添加到存储区时，其全局唯一标识符 (GUID) 属性设置为新值。When a new is added to the store its globally unique identifier (GUID) property is set to a new value. 调用时，将 检查其属性，以确定是否已将 添加到存储区。When is called, its property is checked to see if the already has been added to the store. 如果 已在存储区中添加并存在， (由其 属性确定) 会引发错误。If the already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its property) an error is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 存储区中已存在具有相同 属性值的 。

span.span: An with the same property value already exists in the store.
has been called on the store.

summary.span: 当存储区中任何 上的定位点更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an anchor on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用于监视对存储区中所含批注的更改， 而无需单独注册每个更改 。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.

value.span: 如果对每次操作都要立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区，则为 ；如果要在应用程序显式调用 时写入批注缓冲区中的数据，则为 。

span.span: if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用显式保存模型的应用程序可以设置 为 `false` ，并 在适当的时候直接调用。Applications that use an explicit-save model can set to `false` and call directly when appropriate. 使用隐式保存模型的应用程序可以将设置 为 `true` ，以便 在每次执行存储操作后自动调用， (添加、删除或修改) 。Applications that use an implicit-save model can set to `true` to cause to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由存储区占用的所有托管和非托管资源。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当完成时，应用程序应调用 。Applications should call when finished with the . 调用 应用程序后，可以释放对的所有引用 ，以使垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling the application can release all references to the to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). 公共 方法用的参数调用受保护 `(Boolean)` 的方法 `disposing` `true` ，以释放所有托管资源和非托管资源。The public method calls the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources. > [!NOTE] > 在 释放对的最后一个引用前调用 。Call before the last reference to the is released. 如果 未调用，则 在垃圾回收器调用商店的方法之前，不会释放资源 。If is not called, resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由存储区占用的非托管资源，并有选择地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保护的 方法由公共方法 和 方法调用。This protected method is called by the public and methods. 公共 调用受保护的 `(Boolean)` 方法， `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。The public invokes the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为时 `true` ， 释放引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, releases all resources held by any managed objects that the references. 还调用 `Dispose()` 每个引用对象的方法。 also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 保证最终为此存储区调用 。

span.span: Guarantees that will eventually be called for this store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写基 方法。This method overrides base method. 应用程序不应直接调用 。The application program should not call directly. 在垃圾回收期间会自动调用，除非通过调用方法禁用 。 is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用显式保存模型的应用程序可以设置 为 `false` ，并 在适当的时候直接调用。Applications that use an explicit-save model can set to `false` and call directly when appropriate. 使用隐式保存模式的应用程序可将设置为，以便在 `true` 每次执行存储操作后自动调用， (添加、删除或修改) 。Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the to `true` to cause to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在应用程序关闭时使用方法 。The following example shows how to use the method when the application closes the .
